description: The idea was to make something resembling a classic Moroccan chicken tagine with green olives and preserved lemon, but to swap out the salty, tart preserved lemon for sweeter, tart poached rhubarb My idea worked; the dish has been a great success at more than one dinner party, and it will be a standby as long as the rhubarb lasts.
title: Chicken Tagine With Rhubarb
title_page: Chicken Tagine With Rhubarb Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
The idea was to make something resembling a classic Moroccan chicken tagine with green olives and preserved lemon, but to swap out the salty, tart preserved lemon for sweeter, tart poached rhubarb. My idea worked; the dish has been a great success at more than one dinner party, and it will be a standby as long as the rhubarb lasts.
Featured in: A Chicken Tagine That Gives Rhubarb The Last Say.
Learn: How to Make Tagine
